turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I would like for you to pick-up a drink for me from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what is the location of the Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's 10 Light Street in Baltimore, MD.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, no problem. What kind of drink am I getting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande iced cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nonfat milk will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK and what about whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any extra flavors or extra add in's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just a grande iced cherry mocha with nonfat milk and no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Was there anything else you wanted me to pickup from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that should be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and I'll just charge that to the account on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so I'm just going to read the order back to double check. Its a nonfat, no whipped cream grande iced cherry mocha right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct, you're the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks. I'll head over to Starbucks on 10 Light Street in Baltimore right now. Shouldn't be more than 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, I will see you soon!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, Bye!
